testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the Place an order button on PV Screen for the portfolios which is up-to-date
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Hive DashBoard screen......................................passed When user selects any portfolio from portfolio dropdown which is up-to-date.passed Then page should be navigated to selected Portfolio summary screen and ‘Place an Order’ button should be enabled on PV screen.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the Place order side tray
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Portfolio screen...........................................passed When the user clicks the ‘Place an order’ button............................passed Then place order side tray should open......................................passed And place order, portfolio dropdown should be pre-populated the selected portfolio tab.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the search portfolio from side tray
testcase.system-out: Given user is on place an order side tray...................................passed When user clicks the portfolio dropdown in `place an order` side tray.......passed Then user should be able to search different portfolios from the portfolio dropdown.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the sell order screen
testcase.system-out: Given user is on place an order side tray...................................passed When the user clicks the sell order button..................................passed Then ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray should be display................passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the cancel button in extended side tray
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user clicks the cancel button from the extended side tray..........passed Then extended side tray should be closed and the user should navigate back to place order side tray.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the portfolio holding searchbox
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When user search for any portfolio holding using the searchbox..............passed Then user should get the result based on the search keyword and select the portfolio_holding.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the exit price
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When user finds the availble exit price of that portfolio holding on extended side tray.passed Then available exit price for that unit should be displayed with est.label..passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the Order amount field on add sell order screen
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user clicks anywhere in the screen without entering anything on the order amount field.passed Then error message should be displayed under the order amount screen........passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the order amount field validation
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user enters the Special character and text values in the order amount text box.passed Then user should not be allowed to enter the special character and text values into the order amount field.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the add button on the ‘add a sell order button’
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user didn’t enter/select anything on the screen....................passed Then ‘Add’ button should be in disable mode.................................passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: validate the maximum order amount
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user enters more than available units..............................passed Then error message should be displayed under the order amount text box......passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: validate order amount and available units are the same
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user enter the enters the order amount which is equal to available units.passed Then user should get the 'Full redemption' message under the order value text box.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the order value calculation
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user enters the order units........................................passed Then order units should be multiplied with the exit price and the result should be subtracted with a transaction fee.passed And Final calculated value should be displayed as order value est with 2 decimal places.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the Advice given ’No’ radio button
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When user select the ’No’ option............................................passed Then 'Advice given' details should not be displayed.........................passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: validate the Advice given ‘Yes’ radio button
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When user select the ’Yes’ option...........................................passed Then advice reason, date, summary and advice method fields should be display under the advice given label.passed And Date field should have todays's field as default........................passed And add button should be enabled............................................passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the draft order page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on ‘Add a sell order’ extended side tray......................passed When the user clicks the add button from Add a sell order extended side tray.passed Then order should be saved as draft order and should be displayed on the place order screen.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the draft order
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the draft order screen.....................................passed When user click the available draft order...................................passed Then add sell order extended side tray should open and user should be able to edit the order.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: validate the edit order
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the edit order screen......................................passed When user changes the different asset or order value........................passed And click the update button.................................................passed Then updated new changes should be displayed in the draft order screen......passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: validate the close order button
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the draft order screen.....................................passed When user clicks the close button for any draft order card..................passed Then confirmation pop-up message should be displayed on the screen..........passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the Go back button on the confirmation popup
testcase.system-out: Given user is can able to view the confirmation pop-up for close order......passed When the user clicks the Go back button.....................................passed Then that order should not be closed and order should be displayed on the draft order screen.passed

testcase.classname: ADD Sell order side tray validation
testcase.name: Validate the cancel order button on the confirmation popup
testcase.system-out: Given user is can able to view the confirmation popup for close order.......passed When the user clicks the cancel order button................................passed Then that particular order should be get disappear from the draft order screen.passed
